DataElement.preferredName: Adjuvant Postoperative Targeted Therapy Begin Occurrence Start Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of the start of adjuvant postoperative targeted molecular therapy. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adjuvant Postoperative Targeted Therapy Begin Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the therapeutic application of radiation to treat disease following surgery to remove tumor and associated malignant tissue._Cancer therapies which use drugs to act upon specific molecules, metabolic pathways or processes involved in carcinogenesis, tumor growth, or tumor spread._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Agents given to augment or stimulate a primary therapy or alleviate adverse effects caused by the primary therapy.(NCI):After surgery.:The process of directing an agent to a specific anatomic location.

Concepts.definition: An agent that enhances the activity or therapeutic effect of another pharmacologic substance without having much, if any, therapeutic impact by itself.
Relating to or occurring during the period immediately following a surgical operation.
The process of directing an agent to a specific anatomic location.

Property.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: update for compliance for use on new CDE

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A particular calendar day specified as when an event or activity began or was initiated.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

DataElement.changeDescription: Reviewed and approved for release by TCGA team on 1/8/2010
